tag_list: jobs, career, unemployment, job-search-engine, job, search, employment
overview: Uvisor is a personalized job search engine and graduate of the prestigious Silicon Valley tech conference DEMO. Uvisor enables job seekers to efficiently search and evaluate job openings with its Automated Search and Qualification Intelligence Technology. This technology analyzes key sections of a resume, providing job openings the user is most qualified for. Job seekers benefit from quality job postings, resume builder, and a formatted professional profile that can be shared and presented for any professional cause. This level of transparency and guidance gives job seekers the insight and help they need to get hired for the right job.
